# Copy or move child campaigns

Guides you through the process of copying or moving child campaigns within your Zuora tenant.

1.  Launch Promotion Codes from your Zuora tenant.
2.  In the Campaigns tab, locate the campaign that includes the source child campaign, and click ![check icon](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/0eaf7384-7420-48e7-9f41-71bb82dfb981?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..SDL90UF_cQg6Z6EUFcPUkmT9xTdpqMdimMB4-eoI57g) to enter the homepage of the campaign.
3.  Scroll to the bottom of the campaign homepage, select the child campaign that you want to copy or move, and click ![Copy move icon](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/55ec4d3f-4051-4658-8b04-15fea3586414?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..s5F4kAxhdgSZHo4Gkm6-8MPF5yK5JtZtAERxome305U) . Note that you can select multiple campaigns at one time.
4.  In the dropdown list, select Copy/Move . The Move / Copy Code Group dialog is then displayed.
5.  In the first dropdown list of the dialog, select Copy or Move .
6.  In the section dropdown list, select the target campaign that you want to copy or move the selected child campaigns to.
7.  Click Done .

You can find that the selected child campaigns are displayed on the homepage of the target campaign with identical configuration.
